amendment.description: An amendment numbered 21 printed in Part B of House Report 118-535 to increase and decrease funding for the purpose of ensuring that the Department of Veterans Affairs fully funds and competently executes mental health care programs, with a special emphasis on suicide prevention and associated outreach.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kiggans (VA) amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kiggans (VA) amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
